title: Maximal lattice-free convex sets in linear subspaces
abstract: We consider a model that arises in integer programming and show that all irredundant inequalities are obtained from maximal lattice-free convex sets in an affine subspace. We also show that these sets are polyhedra. The latter result extends a theorem of Lovász characterizing maximal lattice-free convex sets in Rn
publisher: Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences (INFORMS)
